Class Student

java.lang.Object
Student
public class Student extends Object
The Student class represents a student with a name and a list of enrolled courses.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ArrayList<Course>
    courses
    A list of courses the student is enrolled in.
    private String
    name
    The name of the student.

  • Field Details

    • name

      private String name
      The name of the student.

    • courses

      private ArrayList<Course> courses
      A list of courses the student is enrolled in.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name)
      Constructs a new Student object with the specified name. Initializes an empty course list.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the student

    • Student

      public Student(Student ob)
      Copy constructor. Creates a deep copy of the given Student object. Copies the name and duplicates all courses.
      Parameters:
      ob - the Student object to copy

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the name of the student as a string.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the student's name

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse(Course c)
      Adds a course to the student's course list. A deep copy of the course is added to avoid aliasing.
      Parameters:
      c - the course to add

    • introduce

      public void introduce()
      Prints the student's name followed by their list of enrolled courses. Each course is listed with its index in the course list.

    • duplicate

      public Student duplicate()
      Returns a deep copy of the student, including their course list.
      Returns:
      a new Student object that is a copy of this student

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the student.
      Returns:
      the name of the student

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the student.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name to assign to the student

    • getCourses

      public ArrayList<Course> getCourses()
      Returns the list of courses the student is enrolled in.
      Returns:
      the list of courses
